name: TAP (MosesG)
description:
T A P

TEXT.

ADVENTURE.

PLATFORMER.

Advert:

  • Guide TAP on his adventures and type your way through the landscapes.
  • Collect coins and bring them to the Shop where you might even meet the Shopkeeper, should you be lucky (and he awake).

Ready? Type away!

P.S.

JAM GAME

This game was made during Ludum Dare 41 under the theme: 'Combine 2 Incompatible Genres'

Developed by MosesG

Music from Newgrounds:

- "Duck Level" by Mydogbuddy7

- "-Swirl! Chiptune remix-" by Waterflame

- "The Village" by ActualElf
